plot: The Hidden City, a 21-part drama set on the streets of London that follows a group of young homeless people living in the streets of London for one year.
plot_en: The Hidden City, a 21-part drama set on the streets of London that follows a group of young homeless people living in the streets of London for one year.
plot_es: The Hidden City, a 21-part drama set on the streets of London that follows a group of young homeless people living in the streets of London for one year.
title: The Hidden City
